user_stories.title: As a user, I want to contact management crud
user_stories.description: Enable users to create, view, edit, and delete individual contact records.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Contact Management CRUD
Then Enable users to create, view, edit, and delete individual contact records.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to account management crud
user_stories.description: Enable users to create, view, edit, and delete organizational account records.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Account Management CRUD
Then Enable users to create, view, edit, and delete organizational account records.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to contact-account association
user_stories.description: Allow users to link multiple contacts to a single account and vice versa.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Contact-Account Association
Then Allow users to link multiple contacts to a single account and vice versa.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to interaction logging
user_stories.description: Enable users to log activities like calls, emails, and meetings against contacts and accounts.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Interaction Logging
Then Enable users to log activities like calls, emails, and meetings against contacts and accounts.
